name: Kirby World
description:
Use the arrows to move backwards and forwards and jump. Once you get to the end of the level and touch the door you will appear in the next level.

There will be bricks to jump and walk on but you cannot fall through the holes otherwise you will die. you need to collect as many coins as you can to get points. There is also a lives system which means if you die you will only start at the beginning of the level you were on. If you had no lives and died then you will start at the first level again. You can collect the lives as well so you have m,ore chance to pass the level.

The is also sneak blocks that you will need to avoid!!
